Cortx | Senior Full Stack Software Engineer, Software Engineer (Artificial Intelligence Focus) | Baltimore, Maryland | Full Time, Onsite http://cortx.com

Cortx is a small, fast-growing, and profitable natural language processing startup located in Baltimore, Maryland. Cortx sits at the intersection of research and business - we take cutting-edge research and transform it into high-impact products which are mainly sold using a SaaS model. Some example products we are working on include:

- A newspaper comprised entirely of robot authors

- A marketing consultant that uses AI to provide actionable advice to clients

- A machine proofreader that automatically corrects bad grammar

The current business we are building is Perfect Tense (https://www.perfecttense.com). Perfect Tense allows webmasters to add grammar correction to their website with a single line of code.

As an AI focused Software Engineer you will improve our grammar corrector's ability to detect and correct different and complex grammar mistakes, both with deep learning models and more traditional approaches. You will be primarily working with Scala and Python (TensorFlow).

As a Senior Full Stack Software Engineer you will lead the Full Stack team that is building the grammar correction interface. You will be working across the entire Ruby on Rails + React stack, and will be heavily exposed to all of the AI/NLP work being done.

Our interview process involves a quick coding screen, a more intensive Skype interview, and a final onsite interview.

You can see more info here http://cortx.com/careers/ or you can contact us at jobsatcortxdotcom - make sure to mention that you found us on HN!
